Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Binary decision to assign a specific worker to a specific task

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Binary decision to include a specific feature in a specific release plan

Name: allocate_story_points
Description: The number of story points to commit to for the next sprint

Name: set_sprint_duration
Description: The duration (in days) of a sprint

Name: assign_team_to_project
Description: Binary decision to assign a specific team to a specific project

Name: prioritize_feature_backlog
DataType: 1-100) of a feature in the backlog

Name: schedule_sprint_start
Description: The start date for a sprint (encoded as Julian day)

Name: determine_team_size
Description: The number of workers to assign to a team

Name: select_retrospective_action
Description: Binary decision to implement a specific improvement action from a retrospective

Name: plan_release_date
Description: The planned date for a release (encoded as Julian day)
